abstract.text: Find out how network latency can affect your apps when trying to get full benefit out of modern network throughput rates. Learn about changes you can make in your app and on your server to boost responsiveness, and prepare your app for improvements coming to the Internet that will offer even lower end-to-end delays.

metadata.title: Reduce networking delays for a more responsive app

inlineContent.text: Be the hero to change that by watching the video and providing notes! It‚Äôs super easy:

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Accelerate networking with HTTP/3 and QUIC

abstract.text: The web is changing, and the next major version of HTTP is here. Learn how HTTP/3 reduces latency and improves reliability for your app and discover how its underlying transport, QUIC, unlocks new innovations in your own custom protocols using new transport functionality and multi-streaming connection groups.
Xcode 14, Swift 5.7, iOS 16, macOS 13 (Ventura), tvOS 16, watchOS 9.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

CPU performance and network throughput rates keep improving, but the speed of light is one limit that isn‚Äôt going any higher. Learn the APIs and best practices to maximize your app‚Äôs responsiveness and efficiency by keeping network round-trip times low and minimizing the number of round trips when performing network operations.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Reduce network delays for your app

abstract.text: Streaming video, multiplayer games, and other real-time experiences depend on responsive, low latency networking. Learn how Low Latency, Low Loss, Scalable throughput (L4S) can reduce network delays and improve the overall experience in your app. We‚Äôll show you how to set up and test your app, network, and server with L4S.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Enhance voice communication with Push to Talk

abstract.text: We‚Äôre coming in loud and clear to help you bring walkie-talkie communication to your app ‚Äî over! Discover how you can add prominent system UI to your Push to Talk app, enabling rapid communication with the tap of a button. We‚Äôll introduce you to the PushToTalk framework and show you how to configure your apps to transmit and receive audio ‚Äî even from the background.
